title: IT'S HAPPENING
body:
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/c3930b57bf1f463a44659d32753417863bf06d8014166da6da0d47e8384c49c9.jpg?w=800&h=1095

OH LORD YES RIOT PLEASE TELL ME IT IS WHAT I THINK IT IS!

https://media.tenor.com/images/2ef9f36e01d6f62d015b8193d53921ac/tenor.gif

This was a teaser on the chinese site for a new skin. And I think you all know there's only one person who wields this kind of sword...

replies.body: I can't wait for the new Ahri skin :D
The spirit sword fits her theme very well
I swear to christ you are giving Riot ideas that would make me question my existence.
this meme make me want to kms
its the new ryze rework q of course what else could it be
Maybe it's his new new NNNNNNNNNNNNNNEW ULT!?

Gotta say, Riot really stepped their game up with their reworks. I mean I never would've thought of giving {{champion:28}} a sword.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Actually as an eve main this is a highly requested feature, we always wanted a sword.
Eve is supposed to be savage and kill her victims with her claws, not using a sword.
Claws are just finger swords. Eve will have one of these on each finger.

it's gotta be a {{champion:29}} nerf
oh wait
riot would never do taht

Ugh.

You're the kind of guy who shows up to a karaoke party to announce the number of people who starve worldwide.
It's 9 million per year

I expected more.

Btw why the fuck do people who are starving have children? To raise the dead count?
Nobody knows

Two main contributing factors.

1. Poverty may not have been the initial condition.
2. Lack of education prevents proper prevention of reproduction.

But enough about that, let's talk about a different look for a virtual character you can buy for a virtual currency!

People who were starving when we were hunter-gatherers had babies as well.
It's a case of "I want to pass on my genes, and I'm not just _not_ gonna do that because I'm not able to feed myself _right now_
I die at the age of 23 anyways, so I may as well have a baby while I still can.

They're generally uneducated about how to sustain a population, so they just have children and hope that they're the exception.
Did we really need a third thread about this, though? xD
Yes.
Melle is excluded from the count, which makes it two + Melle's thread, which was the most important of the Shen teaser threads.
Its actually a new champion teaser for Shens resurrected dad.

That would be awkward.

{{champion:98}} F-father...?
Kuho: Shen, I am glad to see you.
{{champion:98}} :D
Kuho: Because I need my sword back. *Takes Shen's spirit sword and leaves*
{{champion:98}} T_T
{{champion:266}}

eh, nope

sword looks too small to be Aatrox's
Ur sword is too small
Nah, doc, ur delusional.

I am not delusional, everything is exactly how I see it.

http://i.imgur.com/LxeRbAO.png
Ryze is getting a sword now, that's actually cool, can't wait!

{{champion:13}} 
More things to carry... As if the fate of the WORLD wasn't enough. Bloody hells...
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/f81e83a915f6dd98e8a911c528d0869d3f0e9e9ecdf6151b68f87677e9b9298d.png?w=800&h=72
http://i.imgur.com/PUXCXkU.png
(It's Shen. That's his spirit ~~anchor~~ sword)
Jokes on you it's a new ionian champ and that is actually a walking staff.
You really weren't too far off.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=izefQYZv,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-11T00:27:42.235+0000)
>
> This was a teaser on the chinese site for a new skin. And I think you all know there&#039;s only one person who wields this kind of sword...

{{champion:40}} the most famous sword wielder of LoL
I R O N Y
{{champion:157}}?
can't be Yasuo, he got that Nightbringer skin very recently, and beside Yasuo's sword is bent a little

{{champion:10}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:157}} 

Champions with swords. Might have missed some.

~999 people either have never seen reworked Shen or are trolling me.

And the fact that I can't tell is scaring me.

Shen shen shen... Hmmm....


Honestly, idk why everyone's off about it being Shen's sword. It's a skin. We have champions using pool noodles, so changing the shape of a sword isn't an issue.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oUndvmK1kYA/VqaVkfJourI/AAAAAAAAK1o/6NpIYRoM408/s1600/shenpassive.jpg

Only one champion has a floating sword like that with elaborate design, and last I checked Irelia isn't getting a VGU any time soon.

Kayle has an unsheathed blade, Leona too, Aatrox's blade is far longer and wider, Garen's broadsword is much larger, Fiora has a rapier, Master Yi's sword is single-edged, Tryndamere has a curved sword and Yasuo has a katana as long as Sephiroth's.

It can only be Shen, my 999 friends (give or take).

You probably should edit the title of this thread to "IT'S NOT HAPPENING"....
Seems like Master Yi, Fiora and Janna are the champions receiving the skins, not Shen...
Welp ._. I too was convinced it was Shen, but alas....
I got the Shen feeling... But some parts in my brain want to troll me into believing Yi xD
{{champion:11}} {{item:3142}}
OMAI WO NE {{champion:98}}  DERU
